price: Él es Quien conoce lo oculto y lo manifiesto. Él es el Poderoso, el Misericordioso,
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
